comment._content: seems rather strange to be looking into the face of someone in a photo whos grandchildren would likely be dead from old age now !....i love photos of this sort of age

comment.author: 10749411@N03
comment._content: Wonderful photo.  Although they are obviously in the Northern Arctic cold country, racially they look almost identical to Guatemala residents of Meso-America, a trace of Asiatic, a trace of Nordic Viking?   Wonderful photo.
